The 'history of technology' is the history of the invention of tools and
techniques, and is similar in many ways to the history of humanity. Background
knowledge has enabled people to create new things, and conversely, many
scientific endeavors have become possible through technologies which assist
humans to travel to places we could not otherwise go, and probe the nature of
the universe in more detail than our natural senses allow.

Technological artifacts are products of an economy, a force for economic growth,
and a large part of everyday life. Technological innovations affect, and are
affected by, a society's cultural traditions. They also are a means to develop
and project military power.
